p: With the best-case scenario where β was 0.01–0.02, δ was 1/4–1/2, and ν was 1/2–1, a secondary outbreak did not occur, and the total number of recovered or removed patients was 1 (95% CrI 1–1) at day 100 and maximum number of symptomatic infectious patients per day was 0.2 (95% CrI 0–0.3) ( Figure 2). R 0 was 0.021 (IQR 0.016–0.025).
